data.message: How can you get help with a facebook group page?

replies.message: Hi Fawn. May you please provide more detail on the issue you're experiencing? Thanks in advance. -Azaria

I have a group page of over 700 people and most of the people don't see my posts.
Is there a way to fix this?
I had a business page and changed over because of this.

Hi Fawn. Group members have the option to control their notification settings. Depending on their settings, some group members may not be notified of new posts made in the group. We hope this helps clarify. -Azaria
No it really doesn't I have had most tell me they just leave it on the default settings and never see the posts unless they go to the actual page. Can I do something to help this???

Again I have over 700 people on the page, I can no longer see who even sees the posts, and I get a max of 15-20 replies of people that see it. I thought this would be better after changing from a page to a group but nobody is seeing these.

I have heard from a lot of people there are things you can do to increase this but I don't know what... I would hate to have to email all of them or blog with fb being so simple to use but if we can't reach our audience I'm not sure what to do.
